lenders.name: Jim
lenders.occupational_info: I work in HIV/AIDS vaccine research, and I am an amateur photographer.

lenders.name: Gina Soileau
lenders.loan_because: To help people around the world better their lives and the lives of their families.

lenders.name: Anna GV AZ
lenders.loan_because: I'm making Kiva my savings account. The interest I earn is human energy and better lives for others.  A way to save while helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I live on a small farm. I am retired and garden and care for animals.

lenders.name: Maddie & Pete
lenders.loan_because: We believe in social justice, the dignity of work, and standing together. We love the opportunity to work with others through KIVA!

lenders.name: Kristi Jordan
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise the next generation.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: Being a single mother with a daughter.  I understand the day to day struggles and stress...If I can do one thing to reduces that overwhelming feeling for one day, it\'s all worth it.

lenders.name: Nigel and Laura
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an absolutely wonderful way to encourage others who, without Kiva, would continue to struggle.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: many people have helped me too.
lenders.occupational_info: I help organizations imrove their busineeses.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help those in need through assisting them in commerce and trade in their respective area of business around the world.\r\n\"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.\" - Chinese Proverb
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently an undergraduate business student at the University of Toronto.

lenders.name: Lynda Haddon
lenders.occupational_info: I provide classes and support to women and their partners expecting twins, triplets or more. I also provide support for parents of multiple births who have experienced loss of a fetus or child.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I am a neighbour

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I'm self employed with my own screenprinting business. I had money lent to me to start up so why shouldn't other people have the same opportunity as I did?
lenders.occupational_info: We print the works of local artists onto t-shirts for sale in our shop and for wholesale.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women empower themselves to have a new life.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I can\'t help but be convinced that this is the right way to do international development. One person at a time.

lenders.name: Allan
lenders.loan_because: I was watching the news on the CBC here in Canada and they were talking about this Kiva and I thought it was a great idea.  I remember when I started my first business when I was in university and it helped me develop my own business skills.  I received a loan from the provincial government--interest free.  I just think it is great helping other people getting their own businesses going.
lenders.occupational_info: I was in the corporate world for over a decade, and always had a passion for photography and filmmaking.  Now, I am an independent filmmaker working on my first feature film.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and realize that understanding lenders are not easily found, especially when dealing with banks.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate a country Inn and Spa along with my wife and step-son. I also write food and travel articles for two magazines.

lenders.name: Heather, Mika & Ian
lenders.loan_because: We are glad to be able to help other families a bit.  We have been lucky to have family and friends assist us in difficult times, and love the idea of participating in a world community.

lenders.name: Kenton and Erin
lenders.loan_because: We heard about Kiva on TV and decided to get involved to personally make a difference for others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We were married in June 2006 and are working in Calgary, Alberta - Kenton at an auto repair dealership and Erin at a greenhouse.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: It is a way for me to do something directly.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach social work in university and train health and social service workers.

lenders.name: Grant and Amy
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the entreprenurial spirit and that small businesses drive the local economy. We are so fortunate to be in the position to loan and make a difference in other parts of the world.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to help other people who are less fortunate than I to have a better life. I think this is a great idea and I hope more of my friends will also get involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I am now  retired  but recently have worked with youth from the ages between 13 and 16 who have difficulty coping in the regular school environment. I worked in what is called an \"Alternative School\", with students who come from diverse backgrounds, who may have learning,  social and behavioral issues to deal with. They are great kids!

lenders.name: Loch
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is one of the  best ways to encourage sustainable development, and  I like family run agricultural projects because they help a country to become food sufficient which is the first priority. A country that can feed itself can develop other industries.
lenders.occupational_info: Presently I work at an alternate school in British Columbia. In the past I worked as a WUSC volunteer teacher in Lesotho, southern Africa, and on a Dene reserve in northern Alberta.

lenders.name: Darrell
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do..

lenders.name: Enid
lenders.loan_because: I have great admiration for people who are willing to try to make their lives better,in spite of great adversity.

lenders.name: Pierre-Andre
lenders.loan_because: I invest in people. We share one planet.
lenders.occupational_info: System admin, DBA, Devp

lenders.name: Holly & Chris
lenders.occupation: just a couple of compassionate beings
lenders.loan_because: there\'s no reason not to!
lenders.occupational_info: we love to use our hands, to create and to nurture. we\'re always learning and always sharing.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people who are working hard to get ahead in life despite some adverse conditions. I also think I will get my money back which can be recycled to another borrower.
lenders.occupational_info: business & economic development

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.occupation: operations manager for green development firm

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: It is my small contribution to international goodwill.
lenders.occupational_info: Generally making myself useful.

lenders.name: Michael and Kate
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the capital markets in Canada.

lenders.name: Maryse
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I should and because it gives me great pleasure.
lenders.occupational_info: I take people to countries they've dreamt of discovering; I take them on vacations during which they hopefully get acquainted with the history, culture and people of these great countries. I am blessed with a fantastic job, in which I see the world and meet some fantastic people.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: It costs me basically nothing, while it is immensely rewarding to others in greater need.

lenders.name: The Bryson Family
lenders.loan_because: The world will change for the better not by acts of governments but from the small actions of thousands of the nameless faceless individuals acting collectively for humanity.

lenders.name: Geoffrey
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to give a hand up and not a hand out.  It helps build peoples self esteem and contributes to their independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Director of Marketing for a retail chain of gasoline/convenience stores.

lenders.name: Dugey
lenders.loan_because: I hope that helping the lenders to be successful in their businesses will provide security for their families and will also have a positive effect on their communities as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Policy and Compliance Analyst with the City of Toronto's Corporate Access and Privacy Office.

lenders.name: Nico
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to some of the places that kiva operates in and have seen that small amounts of money matter.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people use computers.

lenders.name: Martin & Marie
lenders.loan_because: These folks are trying to better their lives and the lives of their families. I can't imagine better people to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with a security firm and no longer in the Police Force. Sometimes that's a good thing, sometimes it's not!

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: KIVA is fantastic idea and a great way to keep your initial 25 dollars going and going, helping more and more people.
lenders.occupational_info: Recruit volunteers and manage the office for a non-profit organization.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with family, friends and adequate wealth. There is no reason why others shouldn't have the same opportunities in life, especially when they are willing to work hard for them.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to help people make sure that their money is used in ways to protect themselves and their families and to help them thrive.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: it takes money to make money. It's a small thing I can do to believe in someone's ambition to support their family and help them foster their livelihood.
lenders.occupational_info: health care industry for people with diabetes

lenders.name: Jan and Eileen
lenders.loan_because: It may enhance the local economy in a self-sustaining way

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: People need to support people

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: I think there\'s a kind of romance to the idea that amounts of money that seem small to those of us in rich countries can change the lives of people not fortunate enough to have been born with the kind of opportunities I take for granted.\r\n\r\nSo sharing what opportunity I can with a few people who can use it seems like a good thing to do with what I can spare.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office, essentially my job is to provide much of the training materials necessary for workers in the oil industry to stay safe at work.\r\n\r\nA lot of my job also involves paperwork for injured workers, and newsletters about current risks.

lenders.name: Irungu
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing in a world that has often gone wrong.
lenders.occupational_info: Secondary school teacher in the field of Humanities.

lenders.name: Paul Smerdon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help change the world for the better.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get a bank to believe that you are capable of repaying a loan. It is very frustrating when you are trying to better yourself and no-one will lend a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide clientele and staff with comprehensive product knowledge for a full range of beverage alcohol products

lenders.name: The Riley/Sterns
lenders.loan_because: We help ourselves by helping others.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Where else can you do so much good for so little?

lenders.name: Robert H
lenders.loan_because: This program looks more like a 'teach a man to fish' strategy than a 'give a man a fish' handout.
lenders.occupational_info: creating & managing computer networks for small businesses.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped by others in the past. It brings me great joy to be able to offer some small help now.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an old fat guy who loves to cook

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: My motto is if you give a man a fish you feed him for a day.  If you teach a man to fish you will feed him for a life time.  But if you lend a man the money to buy a net and a set up a fish selling business you will lift his family out of poverty.

lenders.name: Doug and Cindy
lenders.loan_because: We're so glad that I saw Kiva on a CBC news telecast. It is something we have been looking to find something like this for quite awhile. To be able to help others yet have them proud of their accomplishments because they have earned them without handouts.
lenders.occupational_info: When you look at what we have readily available to us each and every day, we should feel an obligation to help out others who do not have these oportunities, so that they may better themselves and their family.

lenders.name: Leone
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who are trying hard to get ahead.  The KIVA program seems a good way for people to help others reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I are in our eighties and are enjoying quiet retirement from the stresses of a work-a-day world.  Our health is good and we are thankful for our blessings.

lenders.name: Andrea and Phil
lenders.loan_because: We can make someone's life a little better.
lenders.occupational_info: Andrea works in an office and Phil pulls teeth.

lenders.name: Seon
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to want to start up a business and lack Capital. What goes around surely come around. My Blessings equals your blessings
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get out of debt reduce taxes and plan for retirement ...

lenders.name: jaydee77ca
lenders.occupational_info: Swirling round in this familiar parable.  Spinning, weaving round each new experience.  Recognize this as a holy gift and celebrate this chance to be alive and breathing.

lenders.name: Neill and Caroline
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to help people better their standard of living.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I hope that my small loans will help people to make their life better.

lenders.name: Roddy
lenders.loan_because: helping people to help themselves is one of the reasons we\'re here on earth.
lenders.occupational_info: I served as lawyer to local government (towns, cities, regional districts, villages) throughout British Columbia.

lenders.name: Maury Dergousoff
lenders.loan_because: The passion I see in the entrepreneur's on KIVA gives me renewed hope for the future.
lenders.occupational_info: Improving business performance

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer.  So sue me.

lenders.name: Bhaskar
lenders.loan_because: I am able to and I like the concept.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.  Compared to people in North America I'm not rich...compared to the people requesting help on Kiva...I must seem like a millionaire.
lenders.occupational_info: I do contract work on environmental issues such as private sewage disposal, water supplies, contaminated sites and petroleum storage.

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: I Should

lenders.name: Billie
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a very practical way to help people who are willing to work hard but lack the resources to get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for a large airline for many years.  Now I work in my garden.

lenders.name: jacqui
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help people help themselves

lenders.name: Studio 7 Designs Inc
lenders.loan_because: We love to support entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Sustainable focused design company

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I think it\'s exciting to have an opportunity to make a positive difference someone\'s life. Especially someone who is working hard to better their life and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I own several commercial property maintenance businesses and I invest in real estate.

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: I want to help change the world! Is that too much to ask? I'm sick of corporate control, of the IMF and the World Bank, and the greedy soulless suits who run them.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large book store in a city of 50,000 people. I don't make a lot of money - but happiness is more important than riches. My favourite books are non-fiction; history, political science, environment, cultural studies and philosophy. I have  a university degree in English literature as well - helps sell books!

lenders.name: Jamie & Amie
lenders.loan_because: We realize that we live a privileged life here in North America and lending a little of the money we have allows people to improve their lives. We risk such a small amount to give the chance of a large return.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites for people and ministries such as orphanages, etc. all around the world.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: a little money from me can make a big difference to people looking to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Guy-Gabriel
lenders.loan_because: I think it ia a very good way to help people in need to develop a successful business and to help them and their family. More people should get involved.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people who are working hard to improve their lives and the lives of their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am training to be a hospital chaplain.

lenders.name: syed hassan
lenders.loan_because: i want to devolap my work to the other countries

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I help media organisations to work out what direction they should follow, such as ways of increasing profitability, whether to invest in certain areas, or how to become more competitive

lenders.name: Leslie Carl
lenders.loan_because: My life is good.

lenders.name: lance
lenders.loan_because: it's the least I can do, and I have been to the Philippines three times and know how difficult it is for Filipinos to find work.  I want to do what I can to help Filipino families stay and earn money in the Philippines!!

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a hand up to those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people make their homes more functional and attractive to live in.  Offering full decorating services from new home construction to renovation, colour selection, and much more.

lenders.name: Rud
lenders.loan_because: It's a good feeling to help others and the cost is minimal for me on my pension

lenders.name: Michal
lenders.loan_because: I want to.
lenders.occupational_info: The best description you can find when visiting my web site.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: Trying to be the rainbow in someone's cloud..

lenders.name: harry
lenders.loan_because: There is a need
lenders.occupational_info: I talk to people who are troubled and try to help them find ways to cope with their difficulties.

lenders.name: Sherrie
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Lily
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us, so we want to do good for others.\r\n\"There but for the grace of God go I\"
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse\r\nI have four sons and I gandson\r\nI am married

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people in even a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the photo industry.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Laura & Steve
lenders.occupational_info: Steve teaches physical activity and sports to high-school students. I legally represent injured workers as they fight to get the compensation they deserve.

lenders.name: Paul & Andrew
lenders.loan_because: We are no longer making loans as we are fundamentally opposed to US loans as there are so many opportunities for funding outside this system. Kiva represented more to us and our philosophy is not helping North American society which has many resources upon which to draw. Our solution would have been for Kiva to establish a separate organization for this purpose or to work with one of many organizations already making small business loans rather than establish more overhead.

lenders.name: Tejeet
lenders.loan_because: I am doing my part to make a difference.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I love my neighbor as myself and sometimes that neighbor is in my city, but they may also be on the other side of the world

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I like to make friends around the world

lenders.name: Percy
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to spread good-will and give people a hand-up. I would like to share with those who have not had the same oppotunities as I have had.
lenders.occupational_info: Being retired means that I have worked many many years, and now I can live on savings and pensions.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I want to change a life for the better.... after my best friend Vinnie The Cat (pictured) passed away I realized life is precious and I just felt like helping in his honor.
lenders.occupational_info: I help fix old pipe-organs and make them play like they were new.

lenders.name: Janet, Peter, Emmet, Austin and Myles
Andre and Rosa
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want my son Andre to experience the joy and fulfillment that you can get from sharing with others.
lenders.occupational_info: The best inheritance that I can leave to my child

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: it seems like an intriguing alternative to regular charities. Definately worth a shot..
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Filmmaker by passion. During the day I work with teenage students who are interested in things like film, theatre, art, and music.

lenders.name: Cam & Melita
lenders.loan_because: as we have travelled to some of these countries we have seen that the people who seem to have the least, are the most generous people of all.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage computer systems for small and medium sized Energy companies.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great way to reach across the world and give another hard working person a chance to make their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Mark and Heather
lenders.loan_because: we all need a helping hand sometimes...

lenders.name: Timothy Bahash
lenders.loan_because: As hard as those less fortunate work to support themselves, those more fortunate must work to support them.

lenders.name: jolene
lenders.loan_because: Help women in Rwanda
lenders.occupational_info: A writer and worker for peace

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women enterprenuers  in other countries
lenders.occupational_info: gardening, landscaping

lenders.name: Rana and Yvan
lenders.loan_because: We have the opportunity of owning a business and we know how satisfying the rewards are.  We want to help empower someone to feel the same satisfaction who might not otherwise be able to.

lenders.name: Jacquie
lenders.loan_because: I am trying to make this life meaningful and do my part. My whole life I believed in what is fair and just - and this inequity in the developing world is not very fair or just. The living conditions are horrible for a human being, and 50,000 people a day are dying - if that happened in New York or Toronto or London - well, the rest of us would snap to attention in a hurry. I would like to help someone have the same chances that I have. I hope it helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a municipal government, providing administrative assistance for public works construction contracts.

lenders.name: NELSON
lenders.loan_because: i want to help as many people as i can. $25 can go a long way to help people and i am glad to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a civil servant in alberta, canada.

lenders.name: Don and Sue
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people improve their lives and the lives of their families and communities.

lenders.name: Roland & Mary Anne
lenders.occupational_info: Owners of an independent CD & DVD retail store.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I think that it will make a difference.  I was very fortunate to grow up in a country where it was relatively easy to start a business. I hope that we can create the same conditions everywhere.
lenders.occupational_info: I offer engineering services to clients in Canada.  Primarily my work surrounds the control of processes using computers.  A good example is the automatic controls surrounding a water treatment plant.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage small businesslikeours tosucceed
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the internet site for The Bay Hammock company

lenders.name: Dara
lenders.occupational_info: Budget and Planning Manager for the International AIDS Vaccine Initiative (IAVI)

lenders.name: Denny
lenders.loan_because: helping others help themselves is the way of making a better life for people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an aviation historian

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.occupation: Case Manager with Big Brother Big Sisters

lenders.name: Katie and family
lenders.loan_because: We\'ve all heard \"give a man a fish -feed a man, teach a man to fish -feed a villiage\" These loans are like that. They compound the benefits to many.

lenders.name: Bill & Judy
lenders.loan_because: Bill and I see this as an opportunity for a small amount of money to make a world of difference.
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired but active in the community, particulary drama and singing.

lenders.name: Changeways Clinic
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea of supporting people in pursuit of their own goals.
lenders.occupational_info: We are psychologists (eventually I may get a photo of us all together) specializing in the treatment of anxiety and depression.  We develop materials and therapy protocols and provide training programs for other mental health professionals in Canada and elsewhere.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.occupational_info: I train people to catalyze social and environmental change - Conservation International (www.conservation.org).

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: Since I learned about the concept of microfinancing, I have been looking for a way to become involved at a personal level. I have travelled throughout South America and to the Phillipines and I have seen the incredible impact of very small businesses have on the lives of individuals and their communities. I have been involved in some microbusiness development in my home city as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I give people access to lawyers and legal services through a small monthly membership fee. We legally empower people to make access to legal resources by decreasing the financial barrier to our services.

lenders.name: Kim's Kids
lenders.loan_because: we started loaning as part of a Christmas project. In 2006, we took 1/2 of our personal Christmas spending money to get started. We wanted to help people in other areas of the world who are struggling.

lenders.name: Greg & family
lenders.loan_because: Loans should be based on the character of the person behind the enterprise, and not by the size of their asset base.
lenders.occupational_info: Construction Project management.

lenders.name: Barry
lenders.loan_because: What is a great deal of money to these entrepreneurs is very little to me. If I can help someone who wishes to help themselves, how can I refuse?

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: I think it is very important that we help those who help themselves.

lenders.name: Station Square
lenders.loan_because: Feels good to help in some small way

lenders.name: Malcolm
lenders.loan_because: To give a helping hand is so much more worthwhile than a giving a hand out. A much more dignified way of improving the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Protecting power stations from fire.

lenders.name: Susie
lenders.loan_because: i would like to see poverty wiped out & becaus i was lucky enough to be born & live a pretty good life, i want to help others to live one too.
lenders.occupational_info: as i am retired, i will describe what i do now.  i volunteer for my town, work with a local sustainability group to lessen my carbon footprint, and for fun i knit, hike, swim, do yoga, snowshoe and enjoy nature.

lenders.name: Hillary
lenders.loan_because: it seems to be a small, bureaucracy-free way to make a real difference to an entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I believe that providing a modest amount of \"seed funding\" that eventually translates into financial self-sufficiency is a powerful and effective way of transforming lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money to support scholarship aid and curricular initiatives at Brown University.

lenders.name: Farley
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense to me

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: I feel people need a boost in life, and if I can help, then I am happy to.
lenders.occupational_info: I help develop special events for a local college, which will eventually receive donations from people.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: Micro-loans change the lives of people who want to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.occupational_info: Own and operate an advertising agency.  Business is growing and we have reached over a million dollars in revenue!

lenders.name: John M.
lenders.occupational_info: We try to make things better following this motto "We don't make the products you use, we make the products you use better".

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I can. It's amazing how only a few dollars can make such a difference in the lives of others.   These loans are on behalf of my family:  my husband Ken, my nine-year-old daughter Maya and my seven-year-old son Liam.
lenders.occupational_info: Above all, I am a proud and busy mom. I also do a lot of writing and communications strategy for a large telecommunications company in Canada.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I am an equal opportunity capitalist.

lenders.name: Gabrielle
lenders.loan_because: In Canada we have easy access to education which is what made it possible for me to become financially successful and I want to share my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance, and to loan money to people who are working hard, to hopefully make their lives a little easier, or give more hope, is a good thing. I wish I had a million dollars to give away.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy a lot of things, some big, some little, from sheets of steel to nuts and bolts, that the production workers make into fancy metal cabinets to sell.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than me and because I like the idea of people working to pay back a loan
lenders.occupational_info: I help people solve problems

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: I know the power of small business. Maybe some of these people can borrow my money to take their small business and transform it into a big business, employing more people than just themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a travel agent. I work for a company which sells travel packages to clients. Most recently we have focused mostly on the carribean, however, durring the summer, we will arrange more packages for Europe.

lenders.name: Walter
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of small business
lenders.occupational_info: semi-retired businessman/investor.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I study how life works on a REALLY SMALL scale.

lenders.name: Brendan
lenders.loan_because: My uncle opened an account for me so I can help other people in the world.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: It\'s great to help an individual and know that a small amount of money can have a big impact on a family\'s life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people heal and make art to help keep people healthy by allowing them to relax.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful for all the help I've received in my life. The generosity of many, many people has made it possible for me to become self-supporting. I hope to give to others what has been given to me so freely.
lenders.occupational_info: I promote beauty products for a French cosmetics company.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: We should try to share with others - no matter where they are.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: My mom mentioned to me that she had seen this organization on the news and started to spread the word.  How could someone turn down such a great way to help people!!??
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Plant Breeding.  I test new canola varieties to sell to farmers in hopes it will help their profitability.

lenders.occupational_info: Involved in food ingredients distribution, specializing in dairy processing (cheese, butter, yogurt, kefir and other cultured products).

lenders.name: joseph
lenders.loan_because: everybody starts somewhere.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: Others have helped me to achieve my goals and dreams.  I would like to honor these good people by following their example.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: James, Carolyn & Cooper
lenders.loan_because: We hope that we can make the difference in the life of someone.

lenders.name: Mike

lenders.occupational_info: I teach children and youth who have learning difficulties. I give them the skills they need to help themselves become better learners.

lenders.loan_because: I think that this is the best use of the internet yet!!  To be able to share with others in such an immediate and personal way is a blessing.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both high school teachers- Sandra teaches Grade 10-12 Social Studies (mostly Geography) and Steve is a literacy specialist.

lenders.name: the Wandio/Murrays
lenders.loan_because: We are very fortunate; and we need to share that good fortune.  It costs so little to make such a big difference in these lives.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I teach English literature to university students.  My son and daughter are students.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe that the world\'s wealth is un-evenly balanced and I\'d like to contribute to evening it out.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to make sure development happens in the most environmentally friendly way possible by doing spatial analysis and making maps.

lenders.name: Tristan and Sabine
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the same opportunities in their life that we have had in ours.

lenders.name: Bart
lenders.loan_because: It\'s simplicity.\r\nIt\'s sustainable.\r\nIt\'s significant.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize ESL programs at McGill University

lenders.name: Marisol, David y Emilio
lenders.occupation: Grad Student, Teacher and Little One

lenders.name: Dark Alley Dan
lenders.loan_because: I'm a Libertarian.  Counting on government to do anything productive is like waiting for the Tooth Fairy to pay your rent.  I can't travel from place to place loaning folks money.  Kiva's the next best thing.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I have a lot of respect for someone with the guts and determination to start their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell services that help protect buyers and sellers in real estate transactions.

lenders.name: MARCIA
lenders.loan_because: The world is a small place in a large space - where we are truly "one".
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired scientist.  I used to spend a lot of time looking into a microscope.  Now I spend time enjoying the world and writing about it.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: it makes a real difference in the hands of those who can use the funds.  Re-lending allows the funds to continue to work around the world.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: you only have one life.  do what you should.
lenders.occupational_info: i help people communicate

lenders.name: Randy & Paula
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help people make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: Previously I lost a job and had to sell many of my belongings to buy food and other necessities until government assistance could help. Now I try to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital where I test blood and other body fluids to help physicians diagnose disease in patients.

lenders.name: Josh & Kate
lenders.loan_because: We are so fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: We help communities be healthy

lenders.name: Callum
lenders.loan_because: i care for the future and those less lucky due to corrupt governments

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I\'d like to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a designer of tableware and table linens, but I used to be a biologist at a museum in San Francisco.  I also teach a college  course that I developed called \"Ecology and Production.\"  It introduces design students to the environmental impacts of products and ways to design more sustainably.  The photo is of me and my Mom from the 1970s.

lenders.name: Judy & Dick
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a hand up not a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of the finances and accounting of our housebuilding business

lenders.loan_because: I was always lucky in life

lenders.name: Rodney

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: In tribute to lost family and friends.

lenders.name: Lynda

lenders.occupational_info: I help people find the connection between heart and mind, learn techniques to manage their stress, resolve problems, gain inner peace and bring more joy to their lives.

lenders.name: The Proposal Guy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that a loan with reasonable terms is far more motivating than a grant.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist companies in winning government business.

lenders.name: J. Phillips
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone follow their dreams....
lenders.occupational_info: Emergency Medicine Doctor

lenders.name: jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people!

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: I have travelled a lot around the world, and have seen how difficult life is for many people.  I don\'t make a lot of money, but I would like to share what I do have with others, and help them to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant district attorney in Cambridge, Massachusetts.  I handle only criminal appeals.  My job is to represent the people of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts before the Appeals Court and Supreme Judicial Court.

lenders.name: mike
lenders.loan_because: We have so much and small loans can have a big impact.  Success to people everywhere in the world makes the world a smaller and safer place for everyone.

lenders.name: SarahMonster
lenders.loan_because: I love to support those throughout the world who are making the effort to control their own lives by running a business.
lenders.occupational_info: My work pays my bills. My love is learning.

lenders.name: Wilson
lenders.loan_because: We believe people can be empowered with the right resources. Empowering people and helping them achieve independence is one of the greatest things we can do for another human being. As the saying goes: If you give someone a fish, they can eat for a day. If you teach them how to fish, they can eat for a lifetime.
lenders.occupational_info: We teach managers how to become leaders.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: This is such a personal way to act globally.  My late husband, pictured, believed gratitude was the hallmark of a life and there is no greater act of gratitude than to give.
lenders.occupational_info: In  my community I work with volunteers to identify ways to solve community problems and then raise funds for those solutions.  Much of what I do connects ideas and people.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I think it's the right thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I write songs and sing them for people.

lenders.name: Leonardo Duran
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to not have to worry about food, shelter and health care. I want to share some of that fortune with those who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a professional freelance translator.

lenders.name: David & Helen
lenders.loan_because: People need more little bits of help from more places!
lenders.occupational_info: I create software that helps people use speech recognition and translation systems.

lenders.name: Yonas & Semira
lenders.loan_because: desire to make a positive impact on others and contribute to making our world better.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help in a small way.

lenders.name: Doug and Laura
lenders.loan_because: We can. We have more than enough to meet our own material needs and wants, and are glad to share.
lenders.occupational_info: Laura is a doctor. She evaluates patients applying for government relief. Doug is an accountant, helping individuals and businesses manage their money, and prepare and pay their taxes properly.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have a fortunate life and want to give back to those in need.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help other people directly.
lenders.occupational_info: retired urban planner

lenders.name: helen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping other small business- especially women owned business directly. Kiva gives me that opportunity to DIRECTLY affect soemone who- like me- is in business for herself and does not have the option option of banks and business loans. I beleive if we all put out a hand to each other- we WILL change the world  and how it works by caring for  and supporting each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to heal pain , both emotional and physical, by working on the pain in their bodis in a caring and loving way. I also work with hospice ( people who are dying)  and cancer sufferers who need caring touch and  healing.

lenders.name: Monique & Jim & kids
lenders.loan_because: I can change someone's life with this simple loan.

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: I\'ve been givin the opportunity to make good money here in Canada, and it would be nice to help another person to get that chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I study hard for school, but I am currently working up in Northern Canada where it is between -30 and -45 for lots of the year (even colder sometimes- with wind in the -50\'s and -60\'s, Celsius.  I live in a camp, with a prison crossed with a college dorm atmosphere.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I don\'t have much myself in the way of funds, but I have a great family and they are all doing well. I wanted to give a little something to others who have nothing. Just my little effort to make this a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired school teacher. I had to retired from work because I am handicapped and can no longer work. Before I became a school teacher, I was a sailor, like my father and my grandfather before me.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I like it.  It´s that simple!
lenders.occupational_info: I´m teaching English abroad because I like to learn about different cultures.  I´ll be in Chile until December of 2009.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I\'ve been fortunate enough to travel to 50 countries including many in the developing world and the experience has made me aware of how lucky I am to live in Canada and to be able to travel. I have gained a lot from local people I\'ve met on my travels and I thus feel the desire to give back. I love the concept of Kiva as it helps people to help themselves and I know that 100% of my loan goes to the recipient.

lenders.name: Doctor Schmidt
lenders.loan_because:
Our father, Dr. John R. Schmidt (1911-2003) committed his entire life to the health and wellbeing of Paraguayans. He and his wife Clara (a nurse) went to Paraguay in the early 1940s and remained until his death in 2003. They founded numerous hospitals in Paraguay (in the Chaco as well as in east Paraguay), the most famous of which is the leprosy hospital at Km. 81, called Hospital Menonita.

As a result of this linkage to the country, we care deeply about giving people in Paraguay a chance who are highly motivated, but lack the resources. If you are interested in contacting us regarding similar interests in Paraguay, please contact us at the following e-mail address:
marlena.fiol@cudenver.edu

lenders.name: Anthony Clarke
lenders.loan_because: I want to try to make a difference, and support the country I was bought up in.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I'm continuously blessed, and I want to share those blessings to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I specializes in care strategies for clientele living in Long Term Care & Alzheimer’s Care facilities. I write programming guides for senior care and creative non-fiction books.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: its my responsibility as a human being.

lenders.name: Robert & Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: We  live in a Global Village, it's important for us to recognize the needs of others beyond our community.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: To connect with the people who need the money and watch their success stories unfold.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of 2 boys.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate and it is my turn to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that there are no mistakes in college textbooks. I'm also an ordained priest in the Independent Catholic Christian Church.

lenders.occupational_info: energy efficiency and industrial engineer

lenders.name: Jonathan

lenders.occupational_info: I am on a disability pension and do volunteer work.

lenders.name: Butterfly
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: chrislovescara

lenders.occupational_info: Lead Developer for Buckland Customs Brokers Ltd.  Providing technical guidance, project planning, developer mentoring and solving complex business challenges with technology solutions. Through technology I increase efficiencies and enhance day to day operations while creating solutions to help grow and foster business growth.

lenders.name: Brian

lenders.name: Jeffrey & Natalie
lenders.loan_because: Make loans, not war!

lenders.name: CJ Fonzi
lenders.loan_because: I am committed to international development through entrepreneurship at the base of the economic pyramid.  Economically sustainable and locally borne business, built from the bottom up, are the answer to poverty alleviation.  Empowering people to help themselves will drive change beyond the wildest dreams of government.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for the Global Impact Investing Network.  I'm a manager on our Impact Reporting and Investing Standards team.  We're working on a series of common standards for reporting social impact.  This is a piece of infrastructure that has been identified by Monitor consulting and the Rockefeller as critical to attracting more capital to the Impact Investing space. 

Before taking this role I served as the manager for Monitoring and Evaluation for the Clinton Foundation in India. 

Previously I had worked in India attempting to get a "Base of the Pyramid" business off the ground in the slums of Hyderabad and nearby villages.  The project was a partnership between Cornell University and DuDpont.
